body_html:
@weiyangfb it's the weights that are sparse. The algorithm that I'm trying to implement (link; scroll down to Box1) truncates weights of small magnitude, so sparse gradients that are slightly off are good enough.

I'll try to throw together a reference (dense) implementation in PyTorch over the next couple days, but I have midterms coming up so I might get caught up in that unfortunately.
